field.label: Server Address
field.help: IP address or hostname of the VLESS+Reality server

field.label: Server Port
field.help: TCP port the server listens on

field.label: UUID
field.help: User UUID configured on the server

field.label: Flow
field.hint: Use xtls-rprx-vision for VLESS+Reality (required for UDP performance)

field.label: Server Name (SNI)
field.help: Domain used for TLS handshake camouflage
field.hint: Must match a domain the server is configured to impersonate, e.g. www.cloudflare.com

field.label: Public Key
field.help: Server x25519 public key for Reality handshake verification
field.hint: Base64url string, provided by the server admin. Without this key the handshake fails.

field.label: Short ID
field.help: Optional hex string that helps the server route connections
field.hint: Leave empty if the server does not require it. Format: up to 16 hex chars (e.g. a1b2c3d4)

field.label: Fingerprint
field.hint: chrome or firefox are safest choices. random picks one each connection.

field.label: SOCKS5 Listen Address
field.help: IP address xray-core binds for its SOCKS5 inbound. tun2socks connects here to forward all TUN traffic through the proxy.
field.hint: Default: 127.0.0.1 (loopback only). Use 0.0.0.0 to listen on all interfaces.

field.label: SOCKS5 Port
field.help: Local loopback port xray-core binds for SOCKS5 inbound
field.hint: Default: 10808. tun2socks connects here to forward TUN traffic. Must not be used by another process.

field.label: TUN Interface
field.help: Virtual network interface created by tun2socks
field.hint: Default: proxytun2socks0. Must match the name in Interfaces → Assignments.

field.label: MTU
field.help: Maximum Transmission Unit for the TUN interface
field.hint: Default: 1500. Reduce to 1380 if large packets (e.g. SSH, large downloads) fail or are slow.

field.label: Xray Log Level
field.hint: warning is recommended for production. Use debug only for troubleshooting — it generates a lot of output.
